column5: Bow or stern?  Either way I'll have to run a wire to the other end...  Would the bouncing in the bow hurt it?
Is prefer bow to be honest if I can
I put mine in my bow Mike - beside my trolling motor battery. The starting battery at the stern is always charged by my outboard.
My chargers have always been in the bow Mike and never an issue
mine is in the bow area in a storage compartment. Have had it around 10 years with no problems.
